RandomSave.cpp
Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /**
00002  * \file RandomSave.cpp
00003  * \brief Examples of saving and restore the state with %RandomLib
00004  *
00005  * Compile/link with, e.g.,\n
00006  * g++ -DHAVE_BOOST_SERIALIZATION -I../include -O2 -funroll-loops
00007  *   -lboost_serialization-mt -o RandomSave RandomSave.cpp ../src/Random.cpp\n
00008  * ./RandomSave
00009  *
00010  * $Id: c06f2e696d28a1c5c42df87e39d8bd87fb1d96dc $
00011  *
00012  * See \ref save, for more information.
00013  *
00014  * Copyright (c) Charles Karney (2011) <charles@karney.com> and licensed under
00015  * the MIT/X11 License.  For more information, see
00016  * http://randomlib.sourceforge.net/
00017  **********************************************************************/
00018 
00019 #include <iostream>
00020 #include <fstream>
00021 #include <string>
00022 #if HAVE_BOOST_SERIALIZATION
00023 #if defined(_MSC_VER)
00024 // Squelch warnings about argument conversion and unchecked parameters with
00025 // boost serialization
00026 #pragma warning (disable: 4244 4996)
00027 #endif
00028 #include <boost/archive/xml_iarchive.hpp>
00029 #include <boost/archive/xml_oarchive.hpp>
00030 #endif
00031 #include <RandomLib/Random.hpp>
00032 
00033 int main(int, char**) {
00034   int retval = 0;
00035   long step = 1000000;
00036   RandomLib::Random r; r.Reseed();
00037   std::cout << "Using " << r.Name() << "\n"
00038             << "with seed " << r.SeedString() << "\n";
00039   r.StepCount(step);            // use r
00040   {
00041     std::cout << "Test save and restore with copy constructor... ";
00042     RandomLib::Random s(r);     // copy r's state into s via copy constructor
00043     r.StepCount(step); s.StepCount(step); // step both generators forward
00044     std::cout << (r == s && r() == s()
00045                   ? "succeeded\n" : (retval = 1, "failed\n"));
00046   }
00047   {
00048     std::cout << "Test save state via count... ";
00049     long long savecount = r.Count(); // save the count
00050     double d = r.Fixed();            // save a random result
00051     r.StepCount(step);               // step r forward
00052     r.SetCount(savecount);           // restore to saved count
00053     std::cout << (d == r.Fixed()
00054                   ? "succeeded\n" : (retval = 1, "failed\n"));
00055   }
00056   {
00057     std::cout << "Test save state via seed and count... ";
00058     RandomLib::Random s(r.Seed()); // constructor with r's seed
00059     s.SetCount(r.Count());         // advance s with r's count
00060     r.StepCount(step); s.StepCount(step); // step both generators forward
00061     std::cout << (r == s && r() == s()
00062                   ? "succeeded\n" : (retval = 1, "failed\n"));
00063   }
00064   {
00065     std::cout << "Test save state to file in portable binary format... ";
00066     {
00067       std::ofstream f("rand.bin", std::ios::binary);
00068       r.Save(f);                // save r in binary mode to rand.bin
00069     }
00070     RandomLib::Random s(0);
00071     {
00072       std::ifstream f("rand.bin", std::ios::binary);
00073       s.Load(f);                // load saved state to s
00074     }
00075     r.StepCount(step); s.StepCount(step); // step both generators forward
00076     std::cout << (r == s && r() == s()
00077                   ? "succeeded\n" : (retval = 1, "failed\n"));
00078   }
00079   {
00080     std::cout << "Test save state to file in text format... ";
00081     {
00082       std::ofstream f("rand.txt");
00083       f << "Random number state:\n" << r << "\n"; // save r with operator<<
00084     }
00085     RandomLib::Random s(0);
00086     {
00087       std::ifstream f("rand.txt");
00088       std::string str;
00089       std::getline(f, str);     // skip over first line
00090       f >> s;                   // read into s with operator>>
00091     }
00092     r.StepCount(step); s.StepCount(step); // step both generators forward
00093     std::cout << (r == s && r() == s()
00094                   ? "succeeded\n" : (retval = 1, "failed\n"));
00095   }
00096   {
00097 #if HAVE_BOOST_SERIALIZATION
00098     std::cout << "Test save state to file in boost xml format... ";
00099     {
00100       std::ofstream f("rand.xml");
00101       boost::archive::xml_oarchive oa(f); // set up an xml archive
00102       oa << BOOST_SERIALIZATION_NVP(r);   // save r to xml file rand.xml
00103     }
00104     RandomLib::Random s(0);
00105     {
00106       std::ifstream f("rand.xml");
00107       boost::archive::xml_iarchive ia(f);
00108       ia >> BOOST_SERIALIZATION_NVP(s); // load saved state to s
00109     }
00110     r.StepCount(step); s.StepCount(step); // step both generators forward
00111     std::cout << (r == s && r() == s()
00112                   ? "succeeded\n" : (retval = 1, "failed\n"));
00113 #else
00114     std::cout << "Skipping boost tests\n";
00115 #endif
00116   }
00117   return retval;
00118 }
